mapper.select: SELECT MID, PASS, NAME, PHONE, 'ROLE_' || upper(RESPONSIBILITY) RESPONSIBILITY FROM MEMBER WHERE MID = #{mid}

SELECT m.member_no, m.email, m.nickname, m.profile_image, m.topic_hashtag, m.accum_activity_point, m.available_activity_point, m.aco_point, subcode_to_name(m.member_level) as member_level FROM member m WHERE m.member_no = #{memberNo}

SELECT ROWNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT m.member_no, m.emo_name, m.emo_buydate FROM my_emoticon m ORDER BY m.emo_buydate desc ) A JOIN member B ON A.member_no = B.member_no WHERE A.member_no= #{memberNo} AND ROWNUM <= 3

SELECT ROWNUM, A.* FROM (SELECT m.title, m.regist_date, m.member_no, m.question_board_no FROM my_bookmark m ORDER BY m.regist_date desc ) A JOIN member B ON A.member_no = B.member_no JOIN question_board C ON C.question_board_no = A.question_board_no WHERE A.member_no= #{memberNo} and rownum <= 3
SELECT title, regist_date, member_no, question_board_no FROM my_bookmark WHERE member_no = #{memberNo} ORDER BY regist_date desc

SELECT ROWNUM, A.* FROM (SELECT q.question_board_no, q.title,write_date, q.answer_cnt, q.member_no FROM question_board q ORDER BY q.write_date desc ) A JOIN member B ON A.member_no = B.member_no WHERE A.member_no= #{memberNo} and rownum <= 3
SELECT question_board_no, title,write_date, answer_cnt, member_no FROM question_board WHERE member_no= #{memberNo} ORDER BY write_date desc
SELECT member_no, history_date, INC_DEC_POINT, CASE WHEN INC_DEC_POINT > 0 THEN '0' ELSE '1' END AS acc_type FROM point_detail WHERE member_no=#{memberNo} ORDER BY history_date desc

SELECT MEMBER_NO,ID,PASSWORD,EMAIL,PHONE_NUM,NAME,NICKNAME,PROFILE_IMAGE,TOPIC_HASHTAG, PERMISSION,LEAVE_DATE,ACCUM_ACTIVITY_POINT,AVAILABLE_ACTIVITY_POINT,ACO_MONEY,ACO_POINT,MEMBER_LEVEL, SNS_TYPE,BAN_TYPE,BAN_DATE,GIT_TOKEN FROM member WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO AUTH_PHONE ( AUTH_PHONE_NO, AUTH_CODE, EXPIRE_DATE, PHONE_NUM ) VALUES ( AUTH_PHONE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{authNum}, SYSDATE + INTERVAL '3' MINUTE, #{phoneNum})
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET GIT_TOKEN = '${gitToken}' WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER ( MEMBER_NO,ID,PASSWORD,EMAIL, PHONE_NUM,NAME,NICKNAME,PROFILE_IMAGE,TOPIC_HASHTAG,PERMISSION,LEAVE_DATE,ACCUM_ACTIVITY_POINT, AVAILABLE_ACTIVITY_POINT,ACO_MONEY,ACO_POINT,MEMBER_LEVEL,SNS_TYPE,BAN_TYPE,BAN_DATE ) VALUES( member_seq.NEXTVAL,#{id},#{password},#{email},#{phoneNum},#{name},#{nickname},#{profileImage}, #{topicHashtag},#{permission},null,#{accumActivityPoint},#{availableActivityPoint},#{acoMoney},#{acoPoint},#{memberLevel}, null,null,null )
